statements.statement: SELECT WIDGET_NUM , WIDGET_NM , WIDGET_URL , dbo.GET_COMM_DESC('WIDGET_SIZE', WIDGET_SIZE) AS WIDGET_SIZE , dbo.GET_COMM_DESC('USE_YN', USE_YN) AS USE_YN , CONVERT(VARCHAR(19), REGIST_DATE, 121) AS REGIST_DATE , REGIST_USER_ID , CONVERT(VARCHAR(19), MODIFY_DATE, 121) AS MODIFY_DATE , MODIFY_USER_ID FROM MES_WIDGET_MA WITH(NOLOCK) WHERE WIDGET_NM LIKE '%' + (CASE WHEN #WIDGET_NM# = '' THEN WIDGET_NM ELSE #WIDGET_NM# END) + '%' ORDER BY REGIST_DATE DESC
SELECT WIDGET_NUM , WIDGET_NM , WIDGET_URL , WIDGET_SIZE , USE_YN FROM MES_WIDGET_MA WITH(NOLOCK) WHERE WIDGET_NUM = #WIDGET_NUM#

MERGE INTO MES_WIDGET_MA AS A USING (SELECT #WIDGET_NUM#) AS B (WIDGET_NUM) ON (A.WIDGET_NUM = B.WIDGET_NUM) WHEN MATCHED THEN UPDATE SET A.WIDGET_NM = #WIDGET_NM# , A.WIDGET_URL = #WIDGET_URL# , A.WIDGET_SIZE = #WIDGET_SIZE# , A.MODIFY_DATE = GETDATE() , A.MODIFY_USER_ID = #REG_ID# , A.USE_YN = #USE_YN# WHEN NOT MATCHED THEN INSERT( WIDGET_NM, WIDGET_URL, WIDGET_SIZE, USE_YN, REGIST_DATE, REGIST_USER_ID, MODIFY_DATE, MODIFY_USER_ID ) VALUES ( #WIDGET_NM#, #WIDGET_URL#, #WIDGET_SIZE#, #USE_YN#, GETDATE(), #REG_ID#, GETDATE(), #REG_ID# );
UPDATE MES_WIDGET_MA SET USE_YN = 'N' WHERE WIDGET_NUM = #WIDGET_NUM#
